name: Imbue With Addiction
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Black Markets © 2015, Paizo Inc.
components: V, S, M (a dose of an addictive drug or substance)
text: The target immediately becomes addicted to the drug used as the material component during the casting of the spell. If the target was ever addicted to the drug at any point in the past, it takes a –4 penalty on its saving throw.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料 (一剂量的成瘾毒品或物质)
text_zh: 目标在该法术的施法过程中，立刻变得对用作施法材料的毒品成瘾(见GameMastery Guide P.236-237，查询毒品与成瘾的相关规则)。如果目标在过去任何时候，曾对该毒品上瘾过，那他在豁免检定上获得-4减值。 译注：在黑市指南(PZO9462)中有一同名法术，差别在能使用的职业(是否有催眠师)以及详述文本(有无GMG具体页码的指引)，其余内容相同。
